Every year on VideoGameSage a thread is hosted which challenges users to complete all of the games on the Nintendo Entertainment System,and I like to casually participate when I see an opening and feel that NES itch. ﻿

Starting off the year with a game I loved as a kid, I've given Super Sprint a quick play through. The game has just 7 levels making it a quick game to "beat", but the levels repeat with more and more obstacles and harder and harder NPC players on each loop﻿

I ended up getting to level 21 before they finally beat me in a race. I forgot how it resets your score immediately after a single loss, so I didn'tmanage to write it down, but it was around 160k or so﻿
